docs.text: Perpetual Plex in the Cloud ¶ Installation ¶ perplex supports Python 3.6+ and is distributed on PyPI for macOS, Windows, and Linux. $ pip install perplex License ¶ perplex is distributed under the terms of both Apache License, Version 2.0 MIT License at your option.
